<The Thomas Henry Thompson House
3:
--------------------
Text: Thomas Henry Thompson House:  It is a locally notable example of Italianate architecture and was the home of business leader Thomas Henry Thompson, an Irish immigrant whose 1866 general store was the primary mercantile outfit in northwest Polk County.
